title: (x) Tome 5 book cover type & cross - Filosofia, Exocet {Jan E, Conor}
content:
Interested to know the cross like mark too.

Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [CIMG0664.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106212219/http:/typophile.com/files/CIMG0664_0.JPG) | 52.77 KB |
author: R27

comments.content: Don’t know about the cross, but the type is Filosofia Grand Normal and Caps.

“Tome 5” is [**Filosofia** Unicase](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106212219/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/filosofia/unicase/) by [Zuzana Licko](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106212219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Zuzana%20Licko) and the cross is the lowercase “t” from [**Exocet** Heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106212219/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/exocet/heavy/) by [Jonathan Barnbrook](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106212219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jonathan%20Barnbrook).
Yes, “Tome“ is Filosofia Unicase. Can’t say if the rest is plain Filosofia Small Caps or Filosofia Grand Small Caps.
